results.title: Stranger Things
results.brief_description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl in Netflix’s blockbuster retro series.

constellations_other.name: The Suspense Constellation
constellations_other.description: An exploration of music in suspense works.

constellations_other.name: Electric Sound Supercut: composers and their distinctive other worlds
constellations_other.description: Electric sound is commonly associated with science fiction narratives for its auditory oddness, which has symbolised other worldly environments, the unconscious and the 1980s.

constellations_other.name: Dragon's Lair
constellations_other.description: A look at pop-cultural interconnections that spawn from the lair of Don Bluth's arcade classic.

results.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.
description_for_label: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

results.title: Stieg Larsson: The Man Who Played with Fire
results.creator_credit: B-Reel Films, Film i Väst, C More Entertainment, Generalissimo, Nordsvensk Filmunderhållning, TV4, Henrik Georgsson, Olof Berglind, Nathan Grossman and Metha Engqvist Griffiths
results.brief_description: A documentary about the Millennium Trilogy author Stieg Larsson and his pioneering work fighting right-wing extremists and neo-Nazis, an obsession with fatal consequences.

constellations_other.name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
constellations_other.description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.

results.title_for_label: Stieg Larsson: The Man Who Played with Fire
results.creator_credit_for_label: B-Reel Films, Film i Väst, C More Entertainment, Generalissimo, Nordsvensk Filmunderhållning, TV4, Henrik Georgsson, Olof Berglind, Nathan Grossman and Metha Engqvist Griffiths
results.description: A documentary about the Millennium Trilogy author Stieg Larsson and his pioneering work fighting right-wing extremists and neo-Nazis, an obsession with fatal consequences.
description_for_label: A documentary about the Millennium Trilogy author Stieg Larsson and his pioneering work fighting right-wing extremists and neo-Nazis, an obsession with fatal consequences.

results.title: Stay Woke The Black Lives Matter Movement
results.brief_description: Documentary about the Black Lives Matter movement.

constellations_other.name: Confronting injustice on-screen
constellations_other.description: The Black Lives Matter movement and the treatment of African Americans at the hands of authorities is explored in this Constellation that connects hip-hop, the Civil Rights Movement and representation in Hollywood.

results.title_for_label: Stay Woke The Black Lives Matter Movement
results.description: Documentary about the Black Lives Matter movement.
description_for_label: Documentary about the Black Lives Matter movement.

results.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
results.creator_credit: Lucasfilm Ltd., Leifur B. Dagfinnsson, Andres Jauernick and Kathleen Kennedy
results.brief_description: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order.

constellations_other.name: Sounds unreal
constellations_other.description: A history of syncing sound effects, a craft known as Foley in the USA and bootstepping in the UK.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Lucasfilm Ltd., Leifur B. Dagfinnsson, Andres Jauernick and Kathleen Kennedy
results.description: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares to do battle with the First Order.

results.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
results.creator_credit: Lucasfilm Animation, Lucasfilm Ltd., Caroline Kermel and Cary Silver
results.brief_description: Yoda, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Mace Windu and other Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

constellations_other.name: Speculative futures, sci-fi worlds and environmental disaster
constellations_other.description: Deborah Kelly's The Gods of Tiny Things explores extinction and the climate crisis, the scars of colonialism, and the political shift to the right around the world through collage and imagined futures, much like these sci-fi, animated and computer-generated artworks.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Lucasfilm Animation, Lucasfilm Ltd., Caroline Kermel and Cary Silver
results.description: Yoda, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Mace Windu and other Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

video_links.name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars | Official Trailer | Disney+

results.title: Star Trek
results.brief_description: Space. The Final Frontier. The U.S.S. Enterprise embarks on a five year mission to explore the galaxy. The Enterprise is under the command of Captain James T. Kirk with First Officer Mr. Spock, from the planet Vulcan.

constellations_other.name: 1950s television
constellations_other.description: "Good evening ... and welcome to television." Bruce Gyngell’s famous words launched television in Australia in 1956 on Sydney’s TCN9, with the medium finally arriving in the country towards the later end of the decade.

results.description: Space. The Final Frontier. The U.S.S. Enterprise embarks on a five year mission to explore the galaxy. The Enterprise is under the command of Captain James T. Kirk with First Officer Mr. Spock, from the planet Vulcan. With a determined crew, the Enterprise encounters Klingons, Romulans, time paradoxes, tribbles and genetic supermen lead by Khan Noonian Singh. Their mission is to explore strange new worlds, to seek new life and new civilizations, and to boldly go where no man has gone before.
description_for_label: Space. The Final Frontier. The U.S.S. Enterprise embarks on a five year mission to explore the galaxy. The Enterprise is under the command of Captain James T. Kirk with First Officer Mr. Spock, from the planet Vulcan. With a determined crew, the Enterprise encounters Klingons, Romulans, time paradoxes, tribbles and genetic supermen lead by Khan Noonian Singh. Their mission is to explore strange new worlds, to seek new life and new civilizations, and to boldly go where no man has gone before.

results.title: Stabbing at Leia's
results.brief_description: You may or may not know Josh Trank directed a short film that was inspired by the Star Wars universe called “Stabbing at Leia’s.” It was made back in 2007 and it was done in the same style that he directed Chronicle. In fact, this is the short that help him land the Chronicle directing gig.

constellations_other.name: Found footage and the first camcorder
constellations_other.description: Amateur filmmakers turned the camera on their own lives when camcorders like the Sony Betamovie BMC-100P came on the market. The style of footage filmed on camcorders has inspired many fictional films, particularly in the horror genre.

results.description: You may or may not know Josh Trank directed a short film that was inspired by the Star Wars universe called “Stabbing at Leia’s.” It was made back in 2007 and it was done in the same style that he directed Chronicle. In fact, this is the short that help him land the Chronicle directing gig.

results.title: Spoor
results.headline_credit: Czech Republic, France, Germany, Poland, Slovakia and Sweden, 2017
results.brief_description: A story about Janina Duszejko, an elderly woman, who lives alone in the Klodzko Valley where a series of mysterious crimes are committed. Duszejko is convinced that she knows who (or what) is the murderer, but nobody believes her.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Czech Republic, France, Germany, Poland, Slovakia and Sweden, 2017
results.description: A story about Janina Duszejko, an elderly woman, who lives alone in the Klodzko Valley where a series of mysterious crimes are committed. Duszejko is convinced that she knows who (or what) is the murderer, but nobody believes her.

results.title: Spear
results.creator_credit: Arenamedia, Bangarra Dance Theatre, Brown Cab Productions, Justin Monjo, Stephen Page, Jacob Nash and Jennifer Irwin
results.brief_description: A young man reconciles ancient tradition with the modern, urban world in this debut feature from Stephen Page, artistic director of Australia’s renowned Bangarra Dance Theatre.

constellations_other.name: Canopy
constellations_other.description: John Harvey is a Torres Strait Islander producer, director and writer in screen and stage whose work Canopy celebrates Indigenous self-representation.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Arenamedia, Bangarra Dance Theatre, Brown Cab Productions, Justin Monjo, Stephen Page, Jacob Nash and Jennifer Irwin
results.description: A young man reconciles ancient tradition with the modern, urban world in this debut feature from Stephen Page, artistic director of Australia’s renowned Bangarra Dance Theatre.

results.title: Soylent Green
results.creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Richard Fleischer, Walter Seltzer, Stanley R. Greenberg, Russell Thacher and Pat Barto
results.brief_description: In an overpopulated futuristic Earth, a New York police detective finds himself marked for murder by government agents when he gets too close to a bizarre state secret involving the origins of a revolutionary and needed new foodstuff.

constellations_other.name: Arcades and AI
constellations_other.description: Using the godfather of computing, Alan Turing, as a starting point, this Constellation traces the evolution of AI representation on-screen and the way female androids, robots and holograms have been hyper sexualised.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Richard Fleischer, Walter Seltzer, Stanley R. Greenberg, Russell Thacher and Pat Barto
results.description: In an overpopulated futuristic Earth, a New York police detective finds himself marked for murder by government agents when he gets too close to a bizarre state secret involving the origins of a revolutionary and needed new foodstuff.
